story_02_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
He’s not wearing a mask! 
He might not be part of Team Break at all!
story_02_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Ahh! Guess I jumped to the wrong conclusion
again... Sorry about that!
story_02_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
It’s all right. No harm done...
I’m Paulo.
story_02_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
As a Pokémon Trainer, I can’t just sit by and let
Team Break get away with what they’re doing.
I came here to crush them once and for all.
story_02_04000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I’m here for the same thing!
This is one of their hideouts, right?
story_02_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Yeah. Don’t let your guard down—
they could attack us from anywhere...
story_02_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Well, look at what we got here! Didn’t think
we’d get suckers showing up on their own...
Let’s teach ’em a lesson!
story_02_04000/2401_1001_1200_10:
There you are!
Let’s take ’em out, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
